confidence.
New era of partnership management

About Confidence.

Confidence. is the first industry-focused blockchain-based ecosystem that securely verify and track expertise & competency level of an any partner company.

Partnerships are reinvented

Confidence. setting the standart for reliability, trust validation and partnership management.

We use HyperLadger blockchain to create smart-contracts that control distributors and dealers of your business.

Confidence. based on Hyperladger and Microsoft Azure (via Blockchain Workbench)

Confidence. apps

Confidence. is based on various applications that solve specific business tasks.
Confidence. Blockchain
Confidence. is based on HyperLadger blockchain. This is a free solution available to all participants in the ecosystem.
Confidence. IT Chain
Specialized solution for IT industry. Evaluation specifications, control of purchase orders (PO) and a set of tools for software asset management (SAM).
Confidence. QR
